creditline: Gift of Louise J. Drews in memory of her parents Margaret and Carson Jamieson
object_name: Cup from a coffee set with scene of Capetown Harbor
text: This set is decorated with a scene of Dutch ships in Capetown Harbor, with Dutch buildings, flags and a view of Table Mountain in the background.  Capetown Harbor  was a significant stop for ships en route to China or returning home, especially for water and provisions.
title: Cup from a coffee set with scene of Capetown Harbor
